column5: I'm gonna take my Hobie PA to Martindale Pond this weekend. Anyone fished it before? Don't really know what to expect. I heard there's good largemouth and apparently pike too. Hope I can hook 'em both!
More bass than pike. I fish it all the time.  Watch out for the rowers.  And there's carp if you are into that!
lol is that the FPS Doug "BOOM HEAD SHOT" t-shirt your wearin there TC?
Nice one! Not into carp fishing but I'll be sure to try and wrangle some of those bass! Thanks

"My hearts beatin, My hearts beatin, my hands are shakin, my hands are shakin BUT IM STILL SHOOTING!! AND IM STILL GETTING HEAD SHOTS... ITS LIKE BOOM HEAD SHOT... BOOM HEAD SHOT!! BOOM HEADSHOT"  Yes... Yes it is! PWN FISH!
hahahahaha i love pure pwnage! i met jeremy and doug at comicon when i was doing the splinter cell contest.  "everyone knows you run faster with a knife.." LOL
There's lots of fish in there, no real monsters. I made a couple reports from here before, but get little repose.    Decent fishing from shore as well. Bigugli fishes there all the time.
